text: An @NFL @ProFootballHOF player in Las #Vegas today. @AnthonyMunozHOF toured #COVID19 #Vaccine sites encouraging people (with a focus on communities of color) to get vaccinated. @CommishMcCurdy joined him at @VolunteersinMed free clinic. A vaccine recipient also got an autograph! https://t.co/RPlgSCY3Q4
